info.title: AlchemyAPI Keyword and Term Extraction
info.description: AlchemyAPI provides easy-to-use facilities for extracting topic keywords from your publicly-accessible web-based content. These URL processing calls automatically fetch the desired Internet webpage, normalize / clean it (removing ads, navigation links, and other unimportant content), and extract topic keywords.

get.description: AlchemyAPI provides easy-to-use facilities for extracting topic keywords from your publicly-accessible web-based content. These URL processing calls automatically fetch the desired Internet webpage, normalize / clean it (removing ads, navigation links, and other unimportant content), and extract topic keywords.

parameters.name: baseUrl
parameters.description: el-tag output base http url (must be uri-argument encoded)

parameters.name: cquery
parameters.description: a visual constraints query to apply to the web page.

parameters.name: maxRetrieve
parameters.description: maximum number of keywords to extract (default: 50)

parameters.name: sentiment
parameters.description: whether to enable keyword-level sentiment analysis

parameters.name: showSourceText
parameters.description: whether to include the original source text the keywords were extracted from within the API response

parameters.name: sourceText
parameters.description: where to obtain the text that will be processed by this API call.

parameters.name: xpath
parameters.description: an XPath query to apply to the web page.
